metadata.title: CVE-2022-0670 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Openstack manilla owning a Ceph File system "share",which enables the owner to read/write any manilla share or entire filesystem. The vulnerability is due to a bug in the "volumes" plugin in CephManager. This allows an attacker to compromise Confidentiality andIntegrity of a file system. Fixed in RHCS 5.2 and Ceph 17.2.2.

criterions.comment: ceph package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
